title: Can I trade one of my skins for another skin of a equal or lesser price?
body: I have Dragon Fist Lee Sin, but I really want Muay Thai Lee sin and I don't have any RP.  Do you think that I could get a trade, because they are both the same price if I put a support ticket? If not do you think that Riot should implement a system that allowed you to trade skins? Like maybe one time free, or it uses up your refund tokens.

replies.body: We currently don't offer trades for skins. If you have a refund token, and purchased Dragon Fist Lee Sin less than 90 days ago, you'd be able to refund it that way.

That's the thing, I bought it from a long time ago.

Nvm I think someone gifted it to me a while ago.

As of this place in my life I am with no friends in the level 30 classification. This post is not asking. Only stating, if there was a means of sharing the battlefield whether enemy of ally, then and along with having showcased the ability to perform in excellence or magnificent with a Champion in allowing me to witness and learn of a Champion, then I could gift the skin to you. From: FuryofThornsRedo

Maybe something like this: Once every 6th months, you get a stack. You can use a stack to trade a regular non-legacy skin for another regular non-legacy skin that isn't new. You can only do this a number of days equal to your stacks. Stacks are applied retroactively, so if you've played for, say, 24 month, you get 4 stacks, and another stack in 6th months.

I doubt Riot will implement this, I think they want people to buy multiple skins for the same character.
i think you should be able to do it at least once, but i have never heard of it happening or any talk of it before now. However it would never hurt to send in a ticket to see what riot has to say.
